items.name: Marinated Olives
items.description: mixed Greek olives, lemon, garlic, olive oil

items.name: Chips & Dip
items.description: House fried (in canola) sweet potato and idaho potato chips. Served with black pepper ranch (sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, buttermilk, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder) topped with 1⁄2 ounce Grinnel caviar (from bowfin fish, harvested in Alabama) and chives

items.name: Whitefish
items.description:
Whipped whitefish salad (whitefish, mayonnaise), served in a jar.
Served with bagel chips

items.name: Crab Dip
items.description: Crab Mix: Claw Crabmeat (from blue crabs, Venezuela), roasted cauliflower, jalapeno, cream cheese, smoked cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, white onion, adobo seasoning, Worcestershire, fines herbs, smoked paprika, cayenne, lemon juice, Green Tabasco, black pepper. Served with Ritz Crackers (wheat flour, sugar, salt, corn syrup, soy lecithin)

allergies.name: gluten
allergies.notes: can be omitted - no crackers, ask kitchen if can sub tortilla chips or crudite

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Kale, napa cabbage, shaved radish, bagel chips (may contain sesame), lemon juice Caesar dressing: anchovy, egg, canola, EVOO, lemon juice, parmesan. Garnish: grated parmesan, bonito flakes, sesame seeds

items.name: Farro Grain Bowl
items.description: Farro and chickpeas mixed w/ preserved lemon vinaigrette (preserved lemon, ginger, chili, honey, lemon juice, EVOO. Roasted sweet potatoes. Corn Relish: corn and scallion - charred on the plancha, mixed with fines herbs. 1⁄2 Avocado. Harissa Yogurt (harissa chili paste, yogurt, lemon). Kale and shaved radish salad (mixed w/ lemon vinaigrette)

items.name: Chilled Pepper Soup
items.description: Puree of canola, shallot, garlic, ginger, red curry paste, roasted red peppers, white wine, rice vinegar, vegetable stock, oat milk, EVOO Garnish: marinated blue crab (blue crab, lemon vinaigrette, fines herbs) + crispy shallot (GF)

allergies.name: shellfish
allergies.notes: red curry paste, cannot be omitted

items.name: Lobster Roll
items.description: 4 ounce cooked Maine lobster tossed with herb mayonnaise (celery, chives, lemon juice, parsley, lobster oil) Pickled cucumbers (cucumbers, rice vinegar, salt, sugar) Brioche hot dog buns (buttered) Chopped herbs (parsley, chives, tarragon) Served with chips

items.name: Avocado & Lox Tartine
items.description: House Gravlax (ASC certified Atlantic Salmon, cured with salt, sugar, gin, dill and coriander), made in house, sliced thin to 2 ounces. Avocado – Avocado, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lemon, EVOO, salt. Garnish: fried shallots, sesame seeds, dill

items.name: Smoked Turkey Sandwich
items.description: Smoked turkey, chili aioli, artichoke tapenade (cooked artichokes, castelvetrano olives, lemon,herbs), arugula, manchego, whole wheat sourdough

items.name: Egg Sandwich
items.description: Egg served over medium, topped with smoked cheddar, spinach, BBQ aioli, pickled fresno, on a seeded brioche roll. BBQ aioli: house bbq (onions, beer, worcestershire, A-1 sauce, garlic, ), mayonnaise. Pickled fresnos: thin-sliced fresno chilies, rice wine vinegar, salt, sugar

items.name: JG Burger
items.description: 6 oz burger (blend of brisket and chuck) bacon jam (bacon, maple syrup, brown sugar, sherry vinegar, soy sauce, chopped onion). Dansk blue cheese (from Denmark, pastuerized, cow’s milk) - creamy, distinctly buttery, and bursting with tangy, savory notes of sour cream and onion. Pickles, Sliced Raw Red Onion, Dijon sauce, Chips inside the bun,Sesame potato bun. Served with potato chips on the side (can sub)

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: 5.5 oz hake or pollock or MSC certified Cod (all from Northeast Atlantic), dredged in beer batter (AP flour, corn starch, beer, vodka, salt), deep fried. Served over our french fries (old bay). Served with charred lemon and caper aioli (capers, lemon, cornichons, garlic, mayonnaise, lobster oil, chives)

items.name: Fried Artichokes
items.description: Deep-fried artichoke hearts (5 oz), topped with fresh grated parmesan cheese and fines herbs. Served with buttermilk ranch (sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, buttermilk, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder)

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Old bay, malt vinegar aioli (mayo, malt vinegar powder)

items.name: Petit Lettuces
items.description: Mix of seasonal mesclun style mix and house chicory mix (Castelfranco + radicchio + frisee)

items.name: Marinated Olives
items.description: mixed Greek olives, lemon, garlic, olive oil

items.name: House Pickles
items.description: Vegetables (cauliflower, carrots, cucumber, jalapenos, radish,celery ) pickled with chili-infused white vinegar

items.name: Whitefish
items.description:
Whipped whitefish salad (whitefish, mayonnaise), served in a jar.
Served with bagel chips

items.name: Chips & Dip
items.description: House fried (in canola) sweet potato and idaho potato chips. Served with black pepper ranch (sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, buttermilk, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder) topped with 1⁄2 ounce Grinnel caviar (from bowfin fish, harvested in Alabama) and chives

items.name: Crab Dip
items.description: Crab Mix: Claw Crabmeat (from blue crabs, Venezuela), roasted cauliflower, jalapeno, cream cheese, smoked cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, sour cream, white onion, adobo seasoning, Worcestershire, fines herbs, smoked paprika, cayenne, lemon juice, Green Tabasco, black pepper. Served with Ritz Crackers (wheat flour, sugar, salt, corn syrup, soy lecithin)

allergies.name: gluten
allergies.notes: can be omitted - no crackers, ask kitchen if can sub tortilla chips or crudite

items.name: Chilled Pepper Soup
items.description: Puree of canola, shallot, garlic, ginger, red curry paste, roasted red peppers, white wine, rice vinegar, vegetable stock, oat milk, EVOO Garnish: marinated blue crab (blue crab, lemon vinaigrette, fines herbs) + crispy shallot (GF)

allergies.name: shellfish
allergies.notes: red curry paste, cannot be omitted

items.name: Heirloom Tomatoes
items.description: Straciatella: Stracciatella is shreds of fresh mozzarella soaked in sweet cream. Like a creamier burrata. Heirloom tomatoes: heirloom tomatoes, tossed w/ sherry vinaigrette (shallot, Dijon, honey, sherry vinegar, Aleppo pepper, EVOO) Anchovy Pesto: basil, parsley, garlic, green olives, anchovies, parmesan, EVOO Served w/ toasted seeded multigrain brushed w/ garlic clove and EVOO.

items.name: Tuna Tartare
items.description: Served in the style of nacho chips. Tuna Tartare: 3 oz line-caught yellowfin tuna mixed with citrus ponzu, marinated cucumber (salt, rice wine vinegar, fresno pickling liquid, sesame), scallions Citrus ponzu: shallots, yuzu kosho, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, gf soy sauce, sesame oil Served over a bed of guacamole (avocado, lime, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro) Garnish: chili mayo (sriracha, mayonnaise, garlic), chives
items.mise: teaspoon (tuck it in at the pass)

items.name: Summer Chicories
items.description: Mix of Castelfranco + radicchio + frisee, mixed w/ sweet corn mix, roasted pumpkin seeds (aka pepitas) and tarragon vinaigrette (tarragon, feta, crème fraiche, lemon juice, shallot, EVOO). Garnish: cotija cheese (Cotija is an aged Mexican cheese made from cow's milk and named after the town of Cotija, Michoacán. White in color and firm in texture, its flavor is salty and milky. Cotija cheese has been described as akin to a mild feta or parmesan (depending on age). Corn Relish: corn and scallion - charred on the plancha, mixed with fines herbs

items.name: Mussels
items.description: 3⁄4 # mussels, 3 ounces pork chorizo (pork, beef, chili pepper, paprika, mustard, garlic, vinegar, salt, sugar, sodium nitrite), steamed open with white wine, soffrito (fennel, garlic, shallots, red pepper flakes, EVOO), and garnished with chopped spring onions. Finished with herb butter (chives, parsley, basil, butter) Served with garlic bread (baguette, garlic-herb butter, parmesan) and 1⁄2 a charred lemon
items.mise: Fork, Knife, Spoon, 2 bowls for shells

items.name: Lobster Roll
items.description: 4 ounce cooked Maine lobster tossed with herb mayonnaise (celery, chives, lemon juice, parsley, lobster oil) Pickled cucumbers (cucumbers, rice vinegar, salt, sugar) Brioche hot dog buns (buttered) Chopped herbs (parsley, chives, tarragon) Served with chips

items.name: Arctic Char
items.description: Charred Corn: corn and scallion - charred on the plancha, mixed with fines herbs. Pepper Coulis: garlic, shallot, harissa, smoked paprika, sherry vinegar, roasted red peppers, EVOO. Coulis→ A coulis is a form of thin sauce made from puréed and strained vegetables or fruits. Gremolata→parsley, mint, basil, lemon zest, lemon zest, garlic clove, capers, chili flakes, EVOO

items.name: Steak Frites
items.description: 8 oz terras major (aka petit filet or bistro filet), cooked to medium rare, unless otherwise specified. Served over our french fries (old bay), served w/ ramekin of au poivre. Au poivre (peppercorn sauce): shallot, clove, thyme, butter, black peppercorn, brandy, chicken stock, crème fraiche, Dijon mustard

items.name: Lobster Spaghetti
items.description: 4 oz spaghetti tossed with 3 ounces Maine lobster in a noteserately spicy fresh tomato sauce. Tomato sauce - EVOO, garlic, red pepper flakes, cherry tomatoes, capers, castelvetrano olives, fresno chili, white wine, vegetable stock. Finished with butter and fines herbs. Topped with parmesan and toasted panko breadcrumbs.

items.name: Fried Artichokes
items.description: Deep-fried artichoke hearts (5 oz), topped with fresh grated parmesan cheese and fines herbs. Served with buttermilk ranch (sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, buttermilk, black pepper, onion powder, garlic powder)

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Old bay, malt vinegar aioli (mayo, malt vinegar powder)

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: baguette, garlic butter, parmesan

items.name: Petit Lettuces
items.description: Mix of seasonal mesclun style mix and house chicory mix (Castelfranco + radicchio + frisee)

items.name: Pancakes
items.description:
3 ea pancakes (ap flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, buttermilk, milk, whole eggs, melted butter)
Maine Blueberry Compote (maine blueberries, sugar, salt, vanilla)
Cinnamon butter (butter, vanilla extract, cinnamon, mace, salt, sugar)
Vanilla-whipped cream
Side of maple syrup

items.name: Avocado & Lox Tartine
items.description: House Gravlax (ASC certified Atlantic Salmon, cured with salt, sugar, gin, dill and coriander), made in house, sliced thin to 2 ounces. Avocado – Avocado, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lemon, EVOO, salt. Garnish: fried shallots, sesame seeds, dill

items.name: Lobster Omelet
items.description:
2 egg omelet
Filling: 3 ounces picked lobster meat, blend of spinach, ricotta, mozzarella
Garnish – chives
Served w/ a side salad

items.name: Eggs & Hash
items.description: 2 fried eggs over sweet potato hash (sweet potato, herbs, onions, garlic, hot italian sausage), garnished with cilantro

allergies.name: pork
allergies.notes: Can be removed, ring Veg Hash.

items.name: Spicy Egg Sandwich
items.description:
Egg served over medium, topped with chili crisp, smoked cheddar, 1 fried latke, black pepper ranch on a seeded Martin’s roll
Chili Crisp: arbol chilies, ginger, star anise, sugar, cumin, black pepper, canola, shallots, garlic, fresno
BP Ranch: sour cream, mayonnaise, buttermilk, black pepper, oregano, onion powder, roasted garlic puree lemon juice
Latkes: Russet potatoes, onion, scallion, flour, butter, black pepper
Comes with side of fries (can sub salad or chips)

items.name: Lobster Roll
items.description: 4 ounce cooked Maine lobster tossed with herb mayonnaise (celery, chives, lemon juice, parsley, lobster oil) Pickled cucumbers (cucumbers, rice vinegar, salt, sugar) Brioche hot dog buns (buttered) Chopped herbs (parsley, chives, tarragon) Served with chips

items.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
items.description:
Boneless chicken thigh, marinated in buttermilk and spices
Dredged in a seasoned flour and deep-fried
Served on a sesame potato bun
Pickled Cucumber
Shredded lettuce
Basil aioli
Hot honey - red pepper flakes, honey, vinegar
Served with a side salad of petit lettuces (can sub for fries or chips)

items.name: JG Burger
items.description: 6 oz burger (blend of brisket and chuck) bacon jam (bacon, maple syrup, brown sugar, sherry vinegar, soy sauce, chopped onion). Dansk blue cheese (from Denmark, pastuerized, cow’s milk) - creamy, distinctly buttery, and bursting with tangy, savory notes of sour cream and onion. Pickles, Sliced Raw Red Onion, Dijon sauce, Chips inside the bun,Sesame potato bun. Served with potato chips on the side (can sub)

items.name: Crab Melt
items.description:
The crab melt is a crabby grilled cheese. Our creamy crab dip with extra scallions, mozzarella, and smoked cheddar, spread between white bread sourdough, slathered w/ Old Bay butter, griddled until golden.
Crab Dip: Blue Crab claw meat (from Venezuela) cauliflower, mayonnaise, sour cream, cheddar cheese, mozzarella, white onion, jalapenos, goya adobo, worcestershire, chives, tarragon parsley, smoked paprika, cayenne, lemon juice, Green tabasco, black pepper
Old Bay Butter: old bay, butter
Served w/ a side salad

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Old bay, malt vinegar aioli (mayo, malt vinegar powder)

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description:
(not listed on the menu, but can be made) There is a button in Square that you can search for.
Avocado – Avocado, lemon, EVOO, salt
Garnish: crispy onions, chili flakes

items.name: Avocado Mash
items.description: Avocado, red onion, cilantro, jalapeno, lemon, EVOO, salt

items.name: Sourdough Toast
items.description: sourdough, 2 slices, toasted

items.name: Petit Lettuces
items.description: Mix of seasonal mesclun style mix and house chicory mix (Castelfranco + radicchio + frisee)

items.name: Mochi Corn Bread
items.description:
Ingredients: Butter, parmesan, aleppo, corn kernels, sour cream, eggs, sugar, salt, mochi sweet rice flour, AP flour
Served w/ honey butter

items.name: Potato Latkes
items.description:
Served 2 per with creme fraiche topped w/ chives
Shredded potatoes, onion, eggs, scallion, flour, butter, black pepper, baking powder
Cook a la plancha and then deep fried in canola

items.name: Fresser Platter for 2
items.description:
1⁄2 Smoked rainbow trout, smoked salmon, house gravlax, whitefish salad (in a jar), scrambled eggs with 1 oz Grinnel caviar (all served with chive cream cheese, tomato, capers, red onion, Dill, bagels, latkes (shredded potatoes, onion, eggs, scallion, flour, butter, black pepper, baking powder) and whole wheat toast
Allergies: Seafood, dairy, allium, nightshade, gluten

Smoked Rainbow Trout (x1/2)
Farm-raised in Idaho – smoked at Samaki in NJ or Acme in Brooklyn

Smoked Salmon – about 3 ounces of sliced Atlantic smoked salmon, from Samaki in NJ or Acme in Brooklyn

House Gravlax (ASC certified Atlantic Salmon, cured with salt, sugar, gin, dill and coriander), made in house, sliced thin to 2 ounces.

Whitefish served in a jar with bagel chips
Wild-caught in the Great Lakes, smoked, whipped with mayonnaise

Bagel & Lox
1 ea bagel – everything is default, toasted
2 ounces smoked salmon sliced tomato, red onion, capers, chive cream cheese

Scrambled Eggs & Caviar
2 ea scrambled eggs topped with 1 oz Grinnel caviar

allergies.name: gluten
allergies.notes: Gluten-free bread may be available, ask the kitchen

items.name: Chocolate Panna Cotta
items.description:
“Cooked Cream” Panna Cotta (milk, heavy cream, sugar, cinnamon, guajillo, cardamom pods, star anise, semi-sweet chocolate, gelatin, espresso)
Spiced Cream (gelatin, heavy cream, sugar, cinnamon, salt)
Almond crumble topping (AP flour, roasted almonds, whole wheat flour, sugar, butter, salt)

items.name: Olive Oil Cake
items.description:
EVOO, mochi flour, cornmeal, eggs, sugar, orange juice, eggs, oat milk
Topped with honey syrup (honey, water)
Served 2 slices, garnished with candied rosemary-orange glace (from orange peel)

Gluten-free and dairy-free.

items.name: Key Lime Tart
items.description:
Filling: Egg yolks, key lime juice, sweetened condensed milk, lime zest
Tart shell: Wheat flour, graham flour, sugar, palm oil, corn syrup, molasses, honey, salt, baking soda
Topping: Whipped vanilla cream (vanilla extract, sugar, heavy cream)

items.name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
items.description:
Cookies (butter, brown sugar, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, date molasses, ap flour, baking soda, cinnamon, oats, raisins)
Served 4 per order, warmed
